name: Megabotix
tag_list: web-design, graphic-design, joomla, cms, social-media, digital-media-management
overview: Our mission at Megabotix is to be the catalyst for emerging and veteran businesses and artists to springboard into their respective markets so that they can continue to develop and advance in their field. They can streamline the process of establishing themselves as experts in their market niche and accelerate their professional success. We monetize raw creativity. That is, we create a positive cash flow around our employees and clients alike. Through strategic cooperation we act as a creative collective for ourselves, and our clients. We are the absolute number one company for realizing personal vision. To accomplish this feat we rely on a scalable business model, strategic workflow, and of course plenty of exercise.
